channel.title: water on ERIC WANG
channel.description: Recent content in water on ERIC WANG

item.title: @Carbone 4 - Consultant
item.description: After graduation, I have joined a consulting firm Carbone 4, specialised in climate change strategy. One of the three mission for a water actor is carbon price and its strategic involvement for future law appliance.

item.title: @Mayor of Paris - Junior research analyst
item.description: The Mairie de Paris is working to reduce the sensation of heat (cf. urban heat island phenomena) and has initiated a feasibility study for access to water with a group from the Paris 1 sustainable development master's programme in order to quantify the exact needs. This study contributed to the opening in 2017 of the innovative open-water swimming pool at the Villette basin.
